body_html:
I see the same problem with Tensorflow 1.4 and Python 3.6 (Anaconda), trying to build the CPU version.

bazel build --verbose_failures --copt=-mavx --copt=-mfma --copt=-msse4.2 --copt=-msse4.1

Interestingly building the GPU version with Python 3.6 works, and building the CPU/GPU version with python 2.7.11 works too.
body_text:

Interestingly building the GPU version with Python 3.6 works, and building the CPU/GPU version with python 2.7.11 works too.
body:
I see the same problem with Tensorflow 1.4 and Python 3.6 (Anaconda), trying to build the CPU version.

bazel build --verbose_failures --copt=-mavx --copt=-mfma --copt=-msse4.2 --copt=-msse4.1

Interestingly building the GPU version with Python 3.6 works, and building the CPU/GPU version with python 2.7.11 works too.
